name: The Zombie Talk Show
description:
You get invited to a talk show because the zombies don't believe you're really a zombie. Can you convince them you are a zombie?

--Controls--

Minigame 1:

WASD - Movement

Minigame 2:

AD - Movement
W/Space - Jump

Minigame 3:

AD/left,Right - Movement
Space - Jump
Ctrl - Crouch
Q - Block
E - Hit

--Credits--
